text: Mykhailo Kushnerenko (; 18 August 1938 â€“ 2 April 2021) was a Ukrainian politician. He was Governor of Kherson Oblast from 1997 to 1998. He was a member of the Supreme Soviet of the Soviet Union and the Supreme Soviet of the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic from 1989 to 1991. Kushnerenko died on 2 April 2021 in Kyiv, Ukraine at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ukrainian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Kyiv Category:Soviet politicians
title: Mykhailo Kushnerenko
